properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TUNISIA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
33-52.00N 011-40.00E AT 091335Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868
E-MAIL: LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY.
OR REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
